IMeshVertexBuffer Interface Reference
[MESH+ Module]

import "meshplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IMeshVertexBuffer:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

MESH+ Vertex Buffer.

Buffer specialization for Vertex Buffers. Buffers are highly platform-dependent and therefore implementation is done in external module, normally in External Module: FWRender. Vertex buffers keep data for vertices of a mesh, including their co-ordinates, colours, normal vectors, texture indices etc. (see MESH_VERTEX for the complete list of supported information). Single buffer may contain data for several meshes, however the user must keep track of the ranges relating to consecutive meshes.

See also:
Buffer Creation and Usage

Implementation in FWRender::MeshDX9VertexBuffer

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT IMeshVertexBuffer::Create (  [in] FWULONG  nSize,
[in] FWULONG  nFormat,
[in] FWULONG  nBones,
[in] FWULONG  nTextures
) 
 

Vertex Buffer construction (details).

Parameters:
nSize Size of the resulting buffer as a number of vertices
nFormat Required format of the buffer, a combination of the MESH_VERTEX flags
nBones Required number of bones (usually MESH_VERTEX_BONEWEIGHT flag should be on)
nTextures Required number of texture indices (usually MESH_VERTEX_TEXTURE flag should be on)
Remarks:
  • The actual format of the created buffer may differ from the required one. See MESH_VERTEX for details.
  • You can query the buffer format with GetFormat
  • You can query the location of various items of the vertex structure with GetCaps
  • With MESH_VERTEX_BONEWEIGHT the actual number of weights allocated will usually be nBones - 1 as the last one is 1 - sum of all the rest

HRESULT IMeshVertexBuffer::GetFormat (  [out] FWULONG *  nFormat,
[out] FWULONG *  nBones,
[out] FWULONG *  nTextures
) 
 

Returns the actual format, number of bones and number of textures allocated by Create (details).

Return values:
nFormat The actual format of the buffer, a combination of the MESH_VERTEX flags
nBones The actual number of bones
nTextures The actual number of textures

HRESULT IMeshVertexBuffer::GetCaps (  [in] enum MESH_VERTEXID  nFlag,
[in] FWULONG  nIndex,
[out] FWULONG *  pOffset,
[out, retval] FWULONG *  pSize
) 
 

Returns the location information for the given format tag in the vertex data structure (details).

Parameters:
nFlag The required vertex structure item (see MESH_VERTEXID)
nIndex Optional index for indexed items (e.g. bone weights, texture data etc.)
Return values:
*pOffset Offset of the required item from the beginning of the vertex data structure
*pSize Size of the required item in the vertex data structure
